styles.css: .entry-content > .wp-block-columns:not(.is-style-full-width) > .wp-block-column, .entry-content > .wp-block-columns.is-style-full-width > .wp-block-column {margin: 0 15px;}@media (min-width: 768px) {.entry-content > .wp-block-columns:not(.is-style-full-width) > .wp-block-column, .entry-content > .wp-block-columns.is-style-full-width > .wp-block-column {margin-left: auto !important;margin-right: auto !important;max-width: var(--wp--style--global--content-size);}}.entry-content > .wp-block-columns:not(.is-style-full-width).has-background, .entry-content > .wp-block-columns.is-style-full-width.has-background {max-width: 100%;}@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {.wp-block-columns.has-background {padding: 0;}}.wp-block-columns.has-background {margin-bottom: 0;padding: 1.25em 0;}@media screen and (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 1199px) {.wp-block-columns.has-background .wp-block-columns {padding: 1.25em 15px;}}@media (min-width: 1200px) {.wp-block-columns.has-background .wp-block-columns {padding: 1.25em 0;}}@media (min-width: 768px) {.entry-content > .wp-block-columns:not(.is-style-full-width) > div.wp-block-column:first-of-type {padding-left: 15px;}}@media (min-width: 768px) and (min-width: 1200px) {.entry-content > .wp-block-columns:not(.is-style-full-width) > div.wp-block-column:first-of-type {margin-left: -15px;}}@media (min-width: 768px) {.entry-content > .wp-block-columns:not(.is-style-full-width) > div.wp-block-column:last-of-type {padding-right: 15px;}}@media (min-width: 768px) and (min-width: 1200px) {.entry-content > .wp-block-columns:not(.is-style-full-width) > div.wp-block-column:last-of-type {margin-right: -15px;}}.wp-block-cover .wp-block-cover__inner-container, .wp-block-cover .wp-block-cover-image .wp-block-cover__inner-container {max-width: var(--wp--style--global--content-size);margin-left: auto !important;margin-right: auto !important;}.wp-block-columns:not(.is-style-full-width) .wp-block-cover {border-radius: 12px;overflow: hidden;padding: 0 30px;}.is-style-full-width .wp-block-cover {width: 100vw;margin-left: -30px;max-width: 100vw;}@media (min-width: 768px) {.is-style-full-width .wp-block-cover {margin-left: 0;}}@media (min-width: 1200px) {.is-style-full-width .wp-block-cover {margin-left: calc((50vw - 600px) * -1);max-width: 100vw;}}figure.wp-block-gallery.has-nested-images figure.wp-block-image {min-height: 34px;}figure.wp-block-gallery.has-nested-images figure.wp-block-image img {width: fit-content;}.wp-block-latest-posts {--posts-gap: 24px;}.wp-block-latest-posts.wp-block-latest-posts__list {display: grid;max-width: 100%;}@media (min-width: 768px) {.wp-block-latest-posts.wp-block-latest-posts__list {grid-template-columns: calc(100% / 2 - var(--posts-gap) * 1 / 2) calc(100% / 2 - var(--posts-gap) * 1 / 2);grid-gap: var(--posts-gap);}}@media (min-width: 960px) {.wp-block-latest-posts.wp-block-latest-posts__list {grid-template-columns: calc(100% / 4 - var(--posts-gap) * 3 / 4) calc(100% / 4 - var(--posts-gap) * 3 / 4) calc(100% / 4 - var(--posts-gap) * 3 / 4) calc(100% / 4 - var(--posts-gap) * 3 / 4);grid-gap: var(--posts-gap);}}.wp-block-latest-posts__featured-image {aspect-ratio: 4/3;width: 100%;overflow: hidden;margin-bottom: 15px;position: relative;display: block;border-radius: 8px;}.wp-block-latest-posts__featured-image img {min-height: 100%;min-width: 100%;object-fit: cover;position: absolute;top: 50%;left: 50%;transform: translate(-50%, -50%);}.wp-block-latest-posts__featured-image + a {font-size: 20px;font-weight: 500;color: var(--wp--preset--color--c-theme-black);text-decoration: none;margin-bottom: 8px;display: block;}.wp-block-latest-posts__post-title {font-size: 20px;font-weight: 500;color: var(--wp--preset--color--c-theme-black);text-decoration: none;margin-bottom: 8px;display: block;}.wp-block-latest-posts__post-author {color: var(--wp--preset--color--c-green-primary);margin-bottom: 10px;text-align: left;font-size: 14px;}.wp-block-latest-posts__post-date {text-align: right;color: var(--wp--preset--color--c-theme-medium-grey);font-size: 12px;}.wp-block-latest-posts__post-author, .wp-block-latest-posts__post-author + .wp-block-latest-posts__post-date {display: inline-block;width: 50%;}.wp-block-latest-posts__post-excerpt {font-size: 16px;color: var(--wp--preset--color--c-theme-dark-grey);line-height: 1.4;font-weight: 300;}.wp-block-table.is-style-no-borders table td {border: none;}footer.wp-block-template-part {padding: 20px 0;background: var(--wp--preset--color--c-theme-black);color: white;}footer.wp-block-template-part > .wp-block-columns {margin-bottom: 0;}footer.wp-block-template-part > .wp-block-columns .wp-block-columns {gap: 20px;margin-top: 0;margin-bottom: 0;}footer.wp-block-template-part > .wp-block-columns .wp-block-columns .column__size-half {flex-grow: 2;}
